content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: GetMetrics path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/workload/v1/stacks/{stack_id}/metrics content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
name workloadid
desc an edgecompute workload id
in query
required false
schema
type str
name startdate
desc a lower bound date to search metrics for
in query
required false
schema
type str
format datetime
name enddate
desc an upper bound date to search metrics for
in query
required false
schema
type str
format datetime
name type
in query
required false
schema
type str
default bandwidth
name granularity
in query
required false
schema
type str
default default
name instancename
desc an instance name within a workload to filter metrics for
in query
required false
schema
type str
name pop
desc a stackpath pop to filter traffic metrics for this field does not apply when retrieving instance type metrics
in query
required false
schema
type str
name region
in query
required false
schema
type str
default all
name groupby
in query
required false
schema
type str
default none
name grouping
desc list of fields to group by
in query
required false
schema
type arr
items
type str
sum get metrics
desc retrieve usage metrics for all workloads in a stack a specific workload or a specific instance in a workload
responses
200
prometheusmetrics
type obj
props
prometheusmetricsstatus
type str
default success
desc a metrics querys resulting status

type obj

type obj

type str
desc the data points labels

desc the time that a data point was recorded
value
type str
desc a data points value
desc an individual metric data point
desc time series data point values
desc time series containing a range of data points over time for each time series
desc a data points value
desc a set of time series containing a range of data points over time for each time series

type obj
results
type arr

type obj

desc the data points labels

props

desc the time that a data point was recorded

desc an individual metric data point
desc time series containing a single sample for each time series all sharing the same timestamp
desc a data points value
desc a set of time series containing a single sample for each time series all sharing the same timestamp
desc the data points in a metrics collection
errortype
type str
desc the type of error encountered when querying for metrics

desc the error encountered when querying for metrics

desc a collection of metrics
